title: Tucker Carlson says he's coming back with show on Twitter
description: Fired Fox News host Tucker Carlson says he'll be resuming a version of his old show on Twitter

title: Rep. George Santos charged by federal prosecutors in New York
description: The charges remain under seal so the allegations are currently unclear.

title: Black Lives Matter activists call for accountability in Irvo Otieno's death
description: Five defendants are charged with second-degree murder in the in-custody death of Irvo Otieno.

title: Tory Lanez denied new trial in shooting of Megan Thee Stallion
description: A Los Angeles judge denied rapper Tory Lanez a new trial after the rapper was convicted of felony assault in Dec. 2022 in the shooting of Megan Thee Stallion.

title: Possible meteorite crashes into New Jersey home, no injuries
description: A metallic object believed to be a meteorite punched a hole in the roof of a central New Jersey home

title: Sex abuse victims to sue Baltimore Archdiocese under new law
description: Civil rights attorney Ben Crump has announced plans to file a series of lawsuits on behalf of people who suffered child sexual abuse at the hands of Catholic priests and other clergy in the Archdiocese of Baltimore

title: Dog co-owned by country's Tim McGraw wins new breed at show
description: A bracco Italiano named Lepshi has won his breed’s debut at the Westminster Kennel Club

title: Man accused of multiple murders sought in jail breach
description: A manhunt is underway for two inmates, including one facing multiple murder charges, who escaped from a Philadelphia detention center this week.

title: Dianne Feinstein will return to the Senate on Tuesday after monthslong absence
description: Sen. Feinstein's absence sparked debate among Democrats on whether she should resign.

title: DOJ, Bureau of Prisons honor fallen corrections officers
description: DOJ, Bureau of Prisons leaders honor fallen corrections officers

title: 2 NYU students killed in Puerto Rico, suspect detained
description: The victims were part of a small group of students who traveled to Puerto Rico on vacation.

title: Fort Hood renamed to Fort Cavazos in effort to erase Confederate symbols
description: Gen. Richard Edward Cavazos was the first Hispanic four-star general in the Army.

title: DA tweaks Jonathan Majors' charge, lawyer says he's innocent
description: Actor Jonathan Majors has been arraigned on a revised domestic violence charge in which a woman says the Marvel star twisted her arm, struck her head and shoved her into a vehicle

title: Woman who wrote book on grief following husband's death accused of his murder
description: Kouri Richins, a Utah woman who published a children's book on processing grief following the death of her husband last year, has now been charged with his murder.

title: Former Vikings, Cal QB Joe Kapp dies at age 85
description: Former Minnesota Vikings and Cal quarterback Joe Kapp has died at the age of 85

title: Minnesota governor to sign bill dedicating highway to Prince
description: The late pop superstar Prince will be honored with a renamed stretch of highway that runs past his Paisley Park museum and recording studios

title: 'Rust' movie medic gets $1.15 million partial settlement
description: A New Mexico judge has awarded $1.15 million to a medic who worked on the “Rust” film set

title: Officers dying in line of duty during a felony down 18% in 2022: FBI
description: Officers

title: Jury deliberations underway in E. Jean Carroll battery, defamation case against Trump
description: Deliberations began Tuesday in former President Trump's defamation and battery trial that's based on a civil lawsuit brought by E. Jean Carroll.

title: Rita Lee, Brazil's long-reigning Queen of Rock, dies at 75
description: Rita Lee Jones, Brazil’s million-selling “Queen of Rock” who gained an international following through her colorful and candid style and such hits as “Ovelha Negra,” “Mania de Você” and “Now Only Missing You,” has died at 75

title: DOJ disrupts Russian-controlled global malware network
description: The Justice Department on Tuesday announced the dismantling of a global network of computers infected by Russian malware.

title: Christie's sale of Austrian heiress' jewels stirs criticism
description: Christie’s is auctioning a staggering 700 pieces of jewelry from the collection of the late Heidi Horten, an Austrian heiress whose German husband built a retail empire starting in the 1930s — in part from department stores and other assets sold by des...

title: New draft guidance drops breast cancer screening age
description: Most women should start screening for breast cancer at age 40, and they should get screened every other year through age 74, according to new draft guidance.

title: 14-year-old girl shot in head by neighbor after playing hide-and-seek on his property
description: A 14-year-old girl was shot in the back of her head by a neighbor after playing hide-and-seek on his property.

title: Illinois trooper shot, motorist dead in exchange of gunfire
description: Police say a state trooper was shot and wounded early Tuesday in southern Illinois during an exchange of gunfire that left the suspect dead

title: General Motors hires former Apple exec to run software unit
description: General Motors has hired a former high-ranking software executive at Apple to run a new software organization at the automaker

title: Sheriff: Louisiana man shot child playing hide and seek
description: Sheriff's officials say a Louisiana man has been arrested on aggravated assault and battery charges after shooting at children playing hide and seek outside his home

title: Germany proposes rules to ease legal changes of gender
description: The German government has presented a proposal for a law that will make it easier for people to legally change their name and gender, ending decades-old rules that require them to get expert assessments and a court’s authorization

title: Party officials: Imran Khan arrested in court in Islamabad
description: Officials from the party of Pakistan’s former Prime Minister Imran Khan say he has been arrested as he appeared in a court in the capital, Islamabad, to face charges in multiple graft cases

title: After 3 shootings in 30 minutes, Kansas City’ suffers another violent weekend
description: Kansas City suffered a violent weekend, with three separate shootings impacting the city’s downtown over 30 minutes late Sunday.

title: More say politics, not the law, drive Supreme Court decisions: POLL
description: Fifty-one percent think Supreme Court justices base rulings mainly on their political opinion.

title: In closing argument, attorney for E. Jean Carroll says she was 'exactly' Trump's type
description: E. Jean Carroll "was exactly" Donald Trump's type, an attorney for Carroll said Monday during closing statements in the former president's defamation and battery trial.

title: China raids offices of business consultancy Capvision
description: Chinese security agents have raided several offices of business consulting firm Capvision as part of an ongoing crackdown on foreign businesses that provide sensitive economic data

title: Oil giant Saudi Aramco's 1st quarter profit down 20% to $31B
description: Oil giant Saudi Aramco has reported a first-quarter profit of $31.88 billion, down nearly 20% from the same period last year as energy prices have sunk over global recession concerns

title: Soldier to be sentenced for murder in Texas protest shooting
description: A U.S. Army sergeant convicted of murder in the shooting death of an armed protester during a Black Lives Matter march in Texas faces up to life in prison when his sentencing hearing begins Tuesday

title: Putin tells Red Square parade 'real war' unleashed on Russia
description: The Russian President was speaking at the Country's Victory Day parade.

title: WATCH:  Inner tubers have close encounter with alligator on Florida river
description: These inner tubers were enjoying a serene float down Florida’s Ichetucknee River when they encountered an alligator with similar plans.

title: Man allegedly hid secret camera in bathroom of Royal Caribbean cruise ship
description: The DOJ unsealed charges against a man who allegedly put a camera inside a bathroom onboard a Royal Caribbean cruise ship and filmed 150 people, including 40 minors.

title: FTX crypto collapse: Sam Bankman-Fried seeks to dismiss most criminal charges
description: Sam Bankman-Fried on Monday sought to dismiss most of the criminal charges he faces in connection with the collapse of FTX.

title: Israeli aircraft strike Islamic Jihad targets in Gaza Strip
description: Israeli aircraft are conducting strikes on Islamic Jihad targets in the Gaza Strip and residents have reported blasts in the Palestinian enclave
